sqlMap.select: SELECT r.* FROM FTGO_RESTAURANT r, FTGO_RESTAURANT_ZIPCODE rz, FTGO_RESTAURANT_TIME_RANGE tr WHERE rz.ZIPCODE = #zipCode# AND rz.RESTAURANT_ID = r.RESTAURANT_ID AND tr.RESTAURANT_ID = r.RESTAURANT_ID AND tr.DAY_OF_WEEK = #dayOfWeek# AND (tr.OPEN_HOUR < #hour# OR (tr.open_Hour = #hour# and tr.open_Minute <= #minute#)) and (tr.close_Hour > #hour# OR (tr.close_Hour = #hour# and tr.close_Minute > #minute#))

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FTGO_RESTAURANT_ZIPCODE rz, FTGO_RESTAURANT_TIME_RANGE tr WHERE rz.ZIPCODE = #zipCode# AND rz.RESTAURANT_ID = #restaurantId# AND tr.RESTAURANT_ID = #restaurantId# AND tr.DAY_OF_WEEK = #dayOfWeek# AND (tr.OPEN_HOUR < #hour# OR (tr.open_Hour = #hour# and tr.open_Minute <= #minute#)) and (tr.close_Hour > #hour# OR (tr.close_Hour = #hour# and tr.close_Minute > #minute#))
select * from FTGO_RESTAURANT r where r.restaurant_id = #restaurantId#
